articles.author: Georgia Hitch
articles.title: Scott Morrison says Chinese military base in Solomon Islands would be 'red line' for Australia, US - ABC News
articles.description: Scott Morrison says the Prime Minister of Solomon Islands has assured him there will be no Chinese military bases and dismisses suggestions Australia's foreign aid cuts contributed to the security pact between the two nations.
articles.content:
Scott Morrison says China building a military base on Solomon Islands would be the "red line" for Australia and the United States, but did not say how Australia would respond if it happened.

articles.description: The husband of fraudster Melissa Caddick has turned to making music – some of his tracks ridiculing Australia’s corporate watchdog and claiming his wife “died as a direct result of an ASIC investigation”.

articles.title: Westpac Australia fined $40 million for charging dead clients - 1News
articles.description: The bank has been fined $113 million in total over a series of compliance failures.
articles.content:
Westpac has been fined $113 million over a series of compliance failures which included charging advice fees to more than 11,800 deceased customers.
